attributes.action: To listen to the former chiefs of staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we call upon the P.m to listen to the former chiefs of staff with regards to the lack of funding to ensure a better safety of our troops in war zones.
this problem is not new but has been ongoing since the Falklands War(conflict).The Royal Navy with no fuel for ships in the 90s,the SA80(small arms for the 1980s)not brought into sevice till the 90s,Shortage of Artillery Munitions causing cancellations of live firing excersises.Lack of body armour in the 1st iraq war 90-91,bodies of troops deployed on the battle field without anti tank weapons,shortage and delays for spares,it is the Government and the MODs responsibillity of duty of care to ensure these things do not happen,if we cant afford a war lets not have one!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
